definition: abbr. for Heilongjiang province 黑龍江|黑龙江[Hei1 long2 jiang1]
black dwarf (pejorative term for non-Han people)

sentences.english: Old black Joe still pickin ' cotton.
sentences.chinese: 老黑人喬仍然在摘棉花。

sentences.english: In 1619 the first Negro slaves were brought to America from West Africa.
sentences.chinese: 1619年第一批黑人奴隸從西非運到美洲。

sentences.english: Lilies are whitest in a blackamoor's hand.
sentences.chinese: 黑人手中的百合花最白。

sentences.english: Among the whites in the United States it is only the reactionary ruling circles who oppress the black people.
sentences.chinese: 在美國壓迫黑人的，只是白色人種中的反動統治集團。

sentences.english: The group was led by black ministers and the local leader of the Black Muslims.
sentences.chinese: 這個組織的領導人是黑人牧師和當地黑人穆斯林首領。

sentences.english: The group was led by black ministers and the local leader of the Black Muslims.
sentences.chinese: 這個組織的領導人是黑人牧師和當地黑人穆斯林首領。

sentences.english: Six little black boys playing with a hive, A bumble-bee stung one, and then there were five.
sentences.chinese: 六個小黑人玩蜂巢，一個被蜜蜂蟄了就還剩下了五個。

sentences.english: Then why not call Bearden a Black American artist?
sentences.chinese: 那麼，爲什麼不把比爾敦稱作一個美國黑人藝術家呢？

sentences.english: Necklacing was also used to punish members of the black community who were perceived as collaborators with the apartheid regime.
sentences.chinese: 也用在黑人團體中和種族隔離政權勾結的成員身上。

sentences.english: Usually, the lives of black women go largely unexamined.
sentences.chinese: 通常來講，黑人女性的生活並不受人關注。

sentences.english: There can be no gainsaying of the fact that racial injustice engulfs this community.
sentences.chinese: 無可置疑的事實是，種族不公平籠罩着該市黑人社區。

sentences.english: Blacks, Asians, whites -- we all live in the same community.
sentences.chinese: 黑人，亞洲人，白人，我們都生活在同一個社區。

sentences.english: The root and culture of Harlem is black history.
sentences.chinese: 哈萊姆文化的根基是黑人歷史。

sentences.english: In his speech, he compared the plight of gays to that of blacks during the civil-rights era.
sentences.chinese: 他在演講中將同志的境遇比作民權運動時期的黑人。

sentences.english: This article holds by the renowned black feminine writer Toni .
sentences.chinese: 本文以著名黑人女性作家託妮。

sentences.english: Civil disobedience will only further the public perception that black people like to cause trouble.
sentences.chinese: 非暴力抗議只會讓公衆關於黑人愛惹麻煩的印象更深。

definition: ethnic Chinese/non-Chinese citizen of Chinese ancestry
